title: 'Do no harm': Medical professionals urge Wellcome Trust to end fossil fuel investments - letter
author: Guardian staff reporter
description: Almost 1,000, from New York to New Zealand, sign open letter to the medical charity calling on it to move its money out of fossil fuels on ethical grounds
